name: Dell DataSafe Backup File
summary: Learn about .DSB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DSB files are used for restoring system checkpoints or for recovering lost data. The user does not interact directly with DSB files, but instead uses the DataSafe Local Backup application interface to restore the data stored in DSB files.

description: Backup file created by Dell DataSafe Local Backup, a backup and recovery application included with Inspiron, Studio, and XPS Dell computer purchases; may store system files (applications, drivers, etc.) and user files (photos, documents, etc.); may be one of several files that comprise the total backup.
